T01D1149:178a-1: ga nd'i sto tra g'a th'a /
T01D1149:178a-3: gand'i'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa /
T01D1149:178a-5: gang zhig sngon du byang chub shing drung nyi ma'i lam nas song cig g'a gred g'a gred //
T01D1149:178a-6: g'a g'a gred g'a ga g'a gred gha na gha
T01D1149:178a-7: gha na gha gred lus la go chas bcing rnams
T01D1149:178a-8: la // gang zhig gzugs mdzes bud med rnams kyi
T01D1149:178a-9: dhu du pa ti dhu du du bhi:dhu du bhi:rnams
T01D1149:178a-10: la // kyis // 'di ltar rjes su mi 'khrugs
T01D1149:178a-11: lha dang mi yis phyag byas gang de sh'a kya
T01D1149:178a-13: gang zhig 'dod lha'i lus can ma rnams ka ha
T01D1149:178a-14: ka ha ka ka h'a h'a h'i ti zhes dgod
T01D1149:178a-15: rnams // gang tshe dregs can rnams kyis ta ti
T01D1149:178a-16: ta ta ti ta t'i t'a ta t'a ti zhes
T01D1149:178a-17: rab tu smras pa rnams dang ni //
T01D1149:178a-18: kud kud bud bud ku k'u tsi ta ku ha
T01D1149:178a-19: ra tsi ta bran po rnams kyis ngag rnams kyi
T01D1149:178a-20: // mi skrag thos pas dri ma kun zhi gang
T01D1149:178a-21: yin thub pa'i dbang po de yis zhi gyur cig
T01D1149:178a-22: / smin ma 'khyog po bskyod dang 'dod dran mda'
T01D1149:178a-23: yi rol pas rdzi ma mig 'bras 'bebs rnams dang
T01D1149:178a-24: // // rtsol ba'i lus can ma rnams yal ga
T01D1149:178a-25: rol pas rtse ba'i yan lag can ma rnams dang
T01D1149:178a-26: // // ni // ngo tsha dang bcas zur gyis
T01D1149:178a-27: smra dang yid 'ong snyan 'jam rab tu dga' byed
T01D1149:178a-28: // // ni // sna tshogs pa'i // tshig rnams
T01D1149:178a-29: kyis ni thugs mi 'khrul pa 'dod dran las rgyal
T01D1149:178a-30: gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1149:178a-31: sa gzhi kun du g-yo dang rno ba'i mda' yi
T01D1149:178a-32: tshogs kyi sa bar snang la ni gtibs pa yi
T01D1149:178a-34: dang khro bo'i me rnams phyogs dang phyogs su 'bar bas chu tshogs rnams 'khrug dang //
T01D1149:178a-35: 'phang mdung ral gri 'khor lo sog le rnon po can gyi bdud kyi dpa' bo sgra 'byin pa //
T01D1149:178a-36: byams pa'i mtshon cha gang gis rab tu zhi zhing mngon rgyal de yi thub dbang khyod kyis srungs //
T01D1149:178a-37: rnam par 'phro ba las skyes khro ba rab gsal rnam gtsigs dge ba nges par sgrogs 'jigs pa'i //
T01D1149:178a-38: 'brug sgrogs char sprin dra ba rab gsal glang po'i bum 'gying bcings pa'i mun nag 'thibs pa dang //
T01D1149:178a-39: 'dod lha'i dpung tshogs 'joms pa'i me 'phro ba dang
T01D1149:178b-0: ral gri'i @178b 'od kyis sna tshogs ma lus gsal
T01D1149:178b-1: // me tog mda' can sde rnams gang gi skad
T01D1149:178b-2: cig gis 'joms sangs rgyas khyod kyis srung bar mdzod
T01D1149:178b-3: // // mdzes pa'i rna ba'i drung gang pad+ma'i 'dab
T01D1149:178b-4: ma lta bu'i rdzi ma mig gi 'bras bu g-yo
T01D1149:178b-5: // // // shin tu chags pas rnam par sgrin
T01D1149:178b-6: ma rab tu rnam rgyas mthun pa dang bcas smin
T01D1149:178b-7: // // // rol pa'i // mig can bdud kyi
T01D1149:178b-8: lus can ma rnams yongs chags gyur dang mtha' dmar
T01D1149:178b-10: kun du drang bar ma btub skyon bsal gyur pa'i drang srong mchog de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1149:178b-11: gang gi thugs ni 'khrug par ma gyur bdud rnams
T01D1149:178b-12: bsal ba rnam gtsigs dog par gcer dang lce bskyod
T01D1149:178b-13: dang / dpal gyi rtse mo lag can rnams dang
T01D1149:178b-14: glang po rta yi gdong can dang ni seng ge
T01D1149:178b-16: rab tu mdzes pa'i 'dod pa'i lha ni rtsa bzhin rtsi ba med pa 'khor bas 'jigs gang gis //
T01D1149:178b-17: sdig pa bsal ba 'jig rten mgon po thub pa'i dbang po sangs rgyas gang yin khyod kyis srungs //
T01D1149:178b-18: gang gi blo ni 'khrug pa med de sa gzhi
T01D1149:178b-19: chu bo'i klung dang rgya mtsho chu 'dzin rnams dang
T01D1149:178b-20: ni // 'brug sgrogs rnams dang bdud kyi dpa' bo
T01D1149:178b-21: sna tshogs brgya phrag gdong dang drag po'i gzugs can
T01D1149:178b-22: ni // mtha' yas dang // gang zhig me tog
T01D1149:178b-23: tog can de ni rtsa bzhin ma rtsis thams cad
T01D1149:178b-24: mkhyen pa dang ni 'dod chags dang bral ba //
T01D1149:178b-25: dpal ldan sangs rgyas dpa' bo sdig pa'i 'jigs pa
T01D1149:178b-26: 'phrog pa rnam 'gyur med pa de yis srung bar
T01D1149:178b-27: mdzod // bdud rnams dpung chen lag na ral gri
T01D1149:178b-28: dgra sta gzhu dang mdung thung lhag par rtse mo
T01D1149:178b-29: mdzod // rno rnams dang // skar mda' 'bebs dang
T01D1149:178b-30: sreg byed du ma sgra gsal sgrogs pa 'jig par
T01D1149:178b-31: byed pa 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyis //
T01D1149:178b-32: gang gi thugs ni mi 'khrugs ri bo bzhin du
T01D1149:178b-33: g-yo ba med pa dam pa skyil mo krung bcings
T01D1149:178b-34: pa // srid gsum 'jigs pa 'phrog byed sangs rgyas
T01D1149:178b-35: dpa' bo shin tu dpa' ba de la 'dud cing
T01D1149:178b-36: pa // phyag 'tshal lo // mthon por aa tta
T01D1149:178b-37: tar dgod rab gsal rnon por myur bar bcings pa'i
T01D1149:179a-0: bsgyings pa dang bcas 'gyed pa gtsigs pa @179a * //
T01D1149:179a-1: ral pa bsgril pa'i skra can mig yon bran rnams kyis //
T01D1149:179a-2: 'joms par bya bar ma nus rnon po'i pa ta ha gsal brdungs pas gang gis byang chub tu //
T01D1149:179a-3: nga rgyal can rnams la ni bya rgod phung por
T01D1149:179a-4: gsal ba'i pa ta ha gsal sangs rgyas dpa' bo
T01D1149:179a-5: bder gyur cig / ko ka ndi r'a ma ra
T01D1149:179a-6: na hi pra ti bha ya ku ha ram da
T01D1149:179a-7: rpa na ne dam ra nna dam /
T01D1149:179a-8: do mba nda mba na du di mba na da
T01D1149:179a-9: ha dhu ha ka dhu ham streeng kha la streeng
T01D1149:179a-11: dzam bra nya dzim bra nya ja dzi ma brang
T01D1149:179a-12: kha mu kha mu khu khu m'ang khu:khu mang khu:khu
T01D1149:179a-13: mang khu:khu mang khu sogs rnams kyis mi 'jigs lha
T01D1149:179a-14: dang mi yis phyag byas sh'akya seng ge khyod kyis
T01D1149:179a-15: srungs // gang gis bdud kyi chu 'dzin thogs pa'i
T01D1149:179a-16: lus kyis yongs su bsgyings pa'i nga rgyal mtshan mo
T01D1149:179a-17: srungs // grol // bdud kyi lus can ma rnams
T01D1149:179a-18: kyi ni gdong gi pad+mo'i nags dpal mi mthun phyogs
T01D1149:179a-19: srungs // grol // gcig pa // yang dag rdzogs
T01D1149:179a-20: pa'i byang chub zla ba dang ni ston ka'i ku
T01D1149:179a-21: mu da bzhin yongs thob pa //
T01D1149:179a-22: de 'dir chos kyi pho nya sgrogs pa chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi ga nd'i'o //
T01D1149:179a-23: bsod pa ma thob tshim med skad cig kyang ni
T01D1149:179a-24: rnam par dpyod pa'i mthar byed 'di la ring po
T01D1149:179a-25: nas // der ni sems rnams chud pas dus kun
T01D1149:179a-26: du ni rgyun mi 'chad par legs par spyod par
T01D1149:179a-27: nas // byed pa yi // 'dir ni dkon mchog
T01D1149:179a-28: gsum gyi bka' bsgor zhugs pa yang yang srog chags
T01D1149:179a-29: rnams la slob pa gang yin pa /
T01D1149:179a-30: 'di ni phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni mi dman
T01D1149:179a-31: rab tu grags pa rtsub pa chos kyi ga nd'i'o
T01D1149:179a-32: // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du skar ma'i tshogs las rnam rgyal bas //
T01D1149:179a-33: 'bar te mu stegs skye bo dang ni rgyal ba'i bstan la 'dir //
T01D1149:179a-34: sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan gyi snying po ga nd'i 'di //
T01D1149:179a-35: g-yul las rgyal ba'i cang te'u gtum po bzhin du grags pa'o //
T01D1149:179a-36: gang yang khyod ni sgrag pa ma yin dza mi
T01D1149:179a-37: dza mi dhu dhu ma ra nyi dza ra nyi
T01D1149:179a-38: dza de na n'a di n'a de /
T01D1149:179a-39: dom ban di ma ba na du dim pa na
T01D1149:179a-40: da bha da bhu dhu dhu bham n'a di bha
T01D1149:179a-41: na n'a di bha na da ma /
T01D1149:179a-42: ra na di ru na dam ru ru na di
T01D1149:179a-43: ya ra la ba kha kha mam kha:kha mam kha:kha
T01D1149:179a-44: mi kha: // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i stobs kyis bdud
T01D1149:179b-0: kyi dpung rnams bcir @179b la 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
T01D1149:179b-1: mi kha: // pa yis ltos // sa gzhi rab
T01D1149:179b-2: tu g-yo ba'i g-yo ba las byung ri bo rab
T01D1149:179b-3: tu bskyod cing ri rab rgyal po g-yo //
T01D1149:179b-4: lha yi tshogs dang gdon gyi 'od zer dang ni
T01D1149:179b-5: klu yi rgyal po ma lus pa rnams skrag pa
T01D1149:179b-6: dang // mu stegs rnams kyi ga nd'i gtum po
T01D1149:179b-7: sna tshogs 'jigs par byed pa thos pas skrag pa
T01D1149:179b-8: dang // dang // sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi ni
T01D1149:179b-9: zhi gzhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa bzhir sgra sgrogs dge
T01D1149:179b-11: 'di ni gtsug lag khang gi rtse mor rab tu sgrogs pa'i ga nd'i ste //
T01D1149:179b-12: sprin gyi sgra bzhin byed pa sgra rnams de ring yid du 'ong ba ni //
T01D1149:179b-13: ma ltar shin tu mnyes gshin pa yis legs par phyi rol song rnams kyi //
T01D1149:179b-14: bu rnams zas dus la ni yongs su 'bod par byed pa'i ga nd'i'o //
T01D1149:179b-15: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yongs su 'joms pa mchog tu gyur pa ste /
T01D1149:179b-16: sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen thams cad kyis ni ma klubs pa'i //
T01D1149:179b-17: sgra sgrogs byed pa'i lha yi rnga chen dang mnyam sgra chen gyi //
T01D1149:179b-18: ga nd'is sdig pa ma lus rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o //
T01D1149:179b-19: 'dis ni lha dang lha min lto 'phye chen pos mchod byas pa //
T01D1149:179b-20: zhi ba mchog tu nye bar bzhud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
T01D1149:179b-21: ga nd'i sgra sgrogs 'chi ba med pa'i rnga chen dang mnyam sgras //
T01D1149:179b-22: mu stegs can gzhan gyi ni snying ni rnam par 'joms pa'o //
T01D1149:179b-23: 'dir ni ga nd'i 'di sgrogs pa yis mi rnams dang //
T01D1149:179b-24: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams 'bod pa ste //
T01D1149:179b-25: bzang po rnams kyi bde gshegs gand'i 'di nyon cig
T01D1149:179b-26: / lus pa med pa'i dge slong tshogs kyis yongs
T01D1149:179b-27: su bskor // glang chen rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i dus
T01D1149:179b-28: tshigs 'khrugs pa'i dus kyi nam mkha'i chu 'dzin khyab
T01D1149:179b-29: su bskor // bzhin gyis // 'gro ba rnams ni
T01D1149:179b-30: 'joms dang yang ba dang 'jigs pas 'dar ba zlog
T01D1149:179b-32: nye bar zhi bar mu stegs ma lus pa yi nga rgyal de yis shin tu med byed pa //
T01D1149:179b-33: thub pa tshogs rnams kun gyis chos rnams 'phel ba'i don bzhag pa de'i gand'i khyod kyis srungs //
T01D1149:179b-34: bsod nams mchog gyur de grub gyur cig 'tsho ba g-yo ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi //
T01D1149:179b-35: mtho ris dang ni byang grol rab ster ngan 'gro
T01D1149:180a-0: ster byed sdig par ma gyur cig /'dir ni @180a
T01D1149:180a-1: * // dbus na 'dug pa'i sbrang ma sgra 'byin lta bur bdag gis smras pa yi //
T01D1149:180a-2: bdud dgra'i zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la me tog snyim pas gtor ro khyod kyis srungs //
T01D1149:180a-3: brgya byin la sogs lha tshogs rnams kyis shin tu gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang //
T01D1149:180a-4: mkha' la sil snyan sgrogs pa rnams kyis yongs gang gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang //
T01D1149:180a-5: mtho ris nas ni sa la babs par grags pa yun rings bskyal byas gang yin pa //
T01D1149:180a-6: snying rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das kyi gandi rab gtum de yis 'gro ba srungs //
T01D1149:180a-7: yum gyi lhums nas 'thon pa tsam gyis rang gi gom pa bdun du bzhud pa po //
T01D1149:180a-8: 'khor ba mthar byung rang gi tshig ni rab tu brjod pa blo gros mi chung ba //
T01D1149:180a-9: gong du skye ba'i dngos por srid pa bsal bar brjod pa rnams su gyur pa yis //
T01D1149:180a-10: bde bar gshegs pa'i mun pa dum bur byed pa'i
T01D1149:180a-11: gandi de yis rgyal gyur cig / lhun po mchog
T01D1149:180a-12: gi stong dang rin chen ri bo nor bu'i 'od
T01D1149:180a-13: can kun gyi ngos dang ni //
T01D1149:180a-14: ri dbang rgyal po gangs ri'i steng dang mi yi
T01D1149:180a-15: yul dang klu yi 'jig rten dag na gnas pa
T01D1149:180a-16: yi // 'chi med 'dod khams dbang po dang ni
T01D1149:180a-17: gling bzhi'i mi bdag nyi zla lha min dbang po
T01D1149:180a-18: yi // rnams // bde gshegs chos kyi gand'i thos
T01D1149:180a-19: pas thams cad bde gshegs dgongs pa bzang la 'bod
T01D1149:180a-20: yi // rnams // pa'o // sa gsum kun na
T01D1149:180a-21: yod pa'i mi sdug rigs mang glang chen dregs pa
T01D1149:180a-23: thams cad mche ba ring po phyir bton rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i rtags ni bzung byas nas //
T01D1149:180a-24: sdig pa'i rigs kun 'ongs pa rdo rje h'um mdzad bla ma mkhas pa'i h'um sgras 'jigs mdzad pas //
T01D1149:180a-25: 'jig rten kun las rgyal ba byung zhes sgra sgrogs zhabs drung 'dud cing sangs rgyas cod pan brgyan //
T01D1149:180a-26: bdud kyi bu mo khri snyan sa la dang 'dra mig ldan nu ma mkhrang zhing rgyas ldan pa //
T01D1149:180a-27: dad pa'i 'gros 'dra bran mo'i steng du zhon zhing glu len rnga yi tshogs brdung mgyogs 'gro ba //
T01D1149:180a-28: rgya mtsho chen po 'byung ba'i chu bo bzhi ltar mi 'chad par mang po 'ongs rnams la //
T01D1149:180b-0: tum tum bhram bhram khyad 'phags @180b sgra rnams rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs byed gand'i nyid yin no //
T01D1149:180b-1: bdud kyi stobs las rgyal byas 'jigs pa chen po bstan pa byas nas skyon zad pa'i //
T01D1149:180b-2: 'dir ni de bzhin shin tu mdzes pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa gang //
T01D1149:180b-3: ma lus yon tan bzang po dang ldan sangs rgyas dag pa'i thugs rje can de yi //
T01D1149:180b-4: gand'i gtum po sdig 'phrog byed pas mi rnams kyi
T01D1149:180b-5: ni dum bur byed gyur cig / tshangs pa lkugs
T01D1149:180b-6: pa ltar gyur lha yi bla ma'i snyems pa med
T01D1149:180b-8: 'tsho byed blo chung gyur to skal pa dang ldan khyab 'jug ci yang mi smrar song //
T01D1149:180b-9: 'dir ni gang gi yon tan grags pas lha rnams gang de ngo tshas yan lag 'khums //
T01D1149:180b-10: thub pa'i gand'i 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa med pas 'gro rnams ngan 'gro las ni srung //
T01D1149:180b-11: tshangs pa mig stong dbang po khyab 'jug nyi zla srin po gnod sbyin rnams dang ni //
T01D1149:180b-12: dri za lto 'phye mi 'am ci dang lha min mi dang bdud ris yi dags dang //
T01D1149:180b-13: gang zhig la dag pas sa yi gzhi rnams gser 'od 'bar 'gyur gos ser can de kun //
T01D1149:180b-14: thams cad ma lus de bzhin gshegs pa bla mas chos ni nyan du 'bod pa'o //
T01D1149:180b-15: gang gis skye bar chung zhing dman pa'i dgongs can mu stegs pa rnams skrag pa 'thob //
T01D1149:180b-16: khyad 'phags 'phel ba'i blo can sangs rgyas pa rnams spro ba rab tu 'phel 'thob pa //
T01D1149:180b-17: gang 'di'i yon tan rnams 'thob rgya chen po yi skyon ni zad par 'gro ba yi //
T01D1149:180b-18: gand'i de yis rtag tu rtsod dus srid pa rnams
T01D1149:180b-19: kyi sdig pa zad gyur cig / rnam dag dgongs
T01D1149:180b-20: can gang la cho ga bzhin du phyag byas mthon
T01D1149:180b-22: gang gis mi mthun phyogs ni thams cad myur du zad pa ster bar byed pa dang //
T01D1149:180b-23: 'khrug long gti mug rab rib thub pa'i chos kyi
T01D1149:180b-24: gand'i de yis 'joms gyur cig tshe dang ldan pa
T01D1149:180b-25: rnams kyis srid pa las byung 'jigs pa de ni
T01D1149:180b-26: khyod kyis chom // 'di thos dge bas sa 'dzin
T01D1149:180b-27: pa yi tshangs sogs sa gzhi'i mthil du myur du
T01D1149:180b-28: khyod kyis chom // ltung // sa 'dzin rnams ni
T01D1149:180b-29: 'dar zhing sa gzhi myur du sa yi 'og tu
T01D1149:181a-0: khyod kyis chom // ltung // 'gro ba dang // mu stegs pa rnams 'jigs par @181a * //
T01D1149:181a-1: byed pa gzhan la phan brtson dag pa'i bdag nyid can //
T01D1149:181a-2: sangs rgyas pa rnams myur du nye bar zhi 'gyur ga ndi de ni 'du bar mdzod //
T01D1149:181a-3: ga ndi'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01D1149:181a-5: // / mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang /
